Label: No Shot Recorded
Description: Penalty or unthrown stone captured in feed

Label: Draw
Description: Draw to the house or button

Label: Guard
Description: High guard or tight guard placed in front of the house

Label: Raise
Description: Raise a stone into the rings

Label: Hit
Description: Hit and stay in the rings

Label: Hit and Roll
Description: Hit with an intentional roll to a new location

Label: Runback
Description: Runback or promote takeout through guards

Label: Tap Back
Description: Tap back or bump a stone deeper into the house

Label: Peel
Description: Peel to remove guards and roll out

Label: Promotion
Description: Promote a guard into a scoring position
